languages.text: {n}Войгтвир колеблется секунду, а затем вытаскивает на свет странное орудие — лезвие без рукоятки, на свету бликующее синим.{/n} "Когда все будет завершено, я заставлю гордую суку фон Валанциус смотреть, как я стираю ее драгоценную династию и предаю ее в руки богов. И ты, {name}, будешь орудием, которым я свершу это благое деяние".

traits.locale_text: {n}Войгтвир колеблется секунду, а затем вытаскивает на свет странное орудие — лезвие без рукоятки, на свету бликующее синим.{/n} "Когда все будет завершено, я заставлю гордую суку фон Валанциус смотреть, как я стираю всю летопись ее драгоценной династии и предаю ее в руки богов варпа. И ты, {name}, будешь одним из орудий, которым я свершу это благое деяние".

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."
languages.original_text: {n}Войгтвир колеблется секунду, а затем вытаскивает на свет странное орудие — лезвие без рукоятки, на свету бликующее синим.{/n} "Когда все будет завершено, я заставлю гордую суку фон Валанциус смотреть, как я стираю ее драгоценную династию и предаю ее в руки богов. И ты, {name}, будешь орудием, которым я свершу это благое деяние".

traits.locale_text: "Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind. Quite the contrary: once my work is done, I will make them serve me! And the first one to bow will be that pompous wench who took away my birthright. I will make her watch as I erase the entire von Valancius chronicle and destroy all that she holds dear... and then I will make her beg for a swift death. Soon. So very soon now..."

"Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind. Quite the contrary: once my work is done, I will make them serve me! And the first one to bow will be that pompous wench who took away my birthright. I will make her watch as I erase the entire von Valancius chronicle and destroy all that she holds dear... and then I will make her beg for a swift death. Soon. So very soon now..."

{n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valantius watch as I erase the entire dynasty chronicle and I commit the fate of the bloodline into the hands of the warp gods... and you, {name}, will be one of the instruments by which I will accomplish this good deed."

{n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I erase the entire dynasty chronicle and I commit the fate of the bloodline into the hands of the warp gods... and you, {name}, will be one of the instruments by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

{n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I erase the entire dynasty chronicle and I commit the fate of the bloodline into the hands of the warp gods... and you, {name}, will be one of the instruments by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

{n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

languages.text: {n}维特威尔犹豫片刻，随后抽出一把古怪的武器。那是一把没有刀柄的刀，刀刃上泛着蓝色的光芒。{/n}“等我的工作结束之后，我会让冯·瓦兰修斯家族那个狂妄自大的老女人亲眼看到，我是如何亲手将她整个王朝献祭给诸神……至于你，{name}，你将是我完成这一正义使命的工具。”
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

traits.locale_text: {n}维特威尔犹豫片刻，随后抽出一把古怪的武器。那是一把没有刀柄的刀，刀刃上泛着蓝色的光芒。{/n}“等我的工作结束之后，我会让冯·瓦兰修斯家族那个狂妄自大的老姑娘亲眼看到，我是如何亲手抹掉整个王朝的历史，将家族的命运交到亚空间诸神手中的……至于你，{name}，你将是我完成这一正义使命的工具。”

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir duda por un instante antes de empuñar un arma extraña: un cuchillo sin mango que brilla azul bajo la luz.{/n} «Cuando mi trabajo haya concluido, haré que esa zorra grandilocuente de von Valancius observe mientras sacrifico toda su dinastía y entrego su destino a los dioses... y usted, {name}, será el instrumento que me permitirá realizar tan noble acto».
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir duda por un instante antes de empuñar un arma extraña: un cuchillo sin mango que brilla azul bajo la luz.{/n} «Cuando mi trabajo haya concluido, haré que esa zorra grandilocuente de von Valancius observe mientras destruyo toda la crónica de su dinastía y entrego el destino de su familia a los dioses de la disformidad... y usted, {name}, será uno de los instrumentos que me permitirán realizar tan noble acto».

languages.text: {n}ボイトヴィルは一瞬ためらった後、奇妙な武器を作り出す。柄のない、光の中で青く光る刃だ。{/n}「私の仕事が終わったら、あの尊大な女、ヴァランシウスに、自分の王朝全体が犠牲にされ、その運命が神々に委ねられるのを見せてやる…そしてお前、{name}も、私がこの正義の行為を達成するための道具のうちの一人になるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

traits.locale_text: {n}ボイドヴィルは一瞬ためらった後、奇妙な武器を作り出す。柄のない、光の中で青く光る刃だ。{/n}「私の仕事が終わったら、王朝の年代記全てを消去し、血統の運命を<歪み>の手に委ねるのを、あの尊大なフォン・ヴァランシウスに見張らせてやる…そしてお前、{name}も、私がこの正義の行為を達成するための道具のうちの一人になるだろう」
{n}ボイトヴィルは一瞬ためらった後、奇妙な武器を作り出す。柄のない、光の中で青く光る刃だ。{/n}「私の仕事が終わったら、あの尊大な女、ヴァランシウスに、自分の王朝全体が犠牲にされ、その運命が神々に委ねられるのを見せてやる…そしてお前、{name}も、私がこの正義の行為を達成するための道具のうちの一人になるだろう」

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir hésite un instant, puis sort une arme étrange : une lame sans manche qui scintille d'une lueur bleue.{/n} « Une fois que j'en aurai fini, je forcerai cette garce prétentieuse de von Valancius à me regarder sacrifier toute sa dynastie et laisser les dieux décider de leur sort... Et c'est vous, {name}, qui serez l'instrument grâce auquel j'accomplirai ce geste libérateur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir hésite un instant, puis sort une arme étrange : une lame sans manche qui scintille d'une lueur bleue.{/n} « Une fois que j'en aurai fini, je forcerai cette garce prétentieuse de von Valancius à me regarder effacer toute la chronique de sa dynastie et laisser les dieux du Warp décider du sort de sa lignée... Et c'est vous, {name}, qui serez l'instrument grâce auquel j'accomplirai ce geste libérateur. »

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir zögert eine Sekunde und zieht dann eine seltsame Waffe hervor – eine Klinge ohne Griff, die im Licht blau schimmert.{/n} "Sobald meine Arbeit getan ist, lasse ich diese eingebildete von Valancius-Hexe zusehen, wie ich ihre gesamte Dynastie opfere und ihr Schicksal in die Hände der Götter lege ... und Ihr, {name}, werdet das Instrument sein, mit dem ich diese rechtschaffene Tat bewerkstelligen werde."
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir zögert eine Sekunde und zieht dann eine seltsame Waffe hervor – eine Klinge ohne Griff, die im Licht blau schimmert.{/n} "Sobald meine Arbeit getan ist, lasse ich dieses eingebildete Frauenzimmer von Valancius zusehen, wie ich die gesamte Chronik der Dynastie auslösche und das Schicksal der Blutlinie in die Hände der Warp-Götter lege ... und Ihr, {name}, werdet eines der Instrumente sein, das mir diese rechtschaffene Tat ermöglicht."

languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir bir anlığına duraksıyor, ardından garip bir silah çıkarıyor: Işıkta mavi mavi parlayan sapsız bir bıçak.{/n} "İşim bittiğinde, tüm hanedanlığı kurban edip kaderlerini tanrılara teslim edişimi o burnu havada hatun von Valancius'a izleteceğim... Sen de {name}, bu haklı eylemi gerçekleştirmeme vesile olacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir hesitates for a second and then produces a strange weapon — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Once my work is done, I'll make that pompous wench von Valancius watch as I sacrifice her entire dynasty and commit their fate to the gods... and you, {name}, will be the instrument by which I will accomplish this righteous act."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir bir anlığına duraksıyor, ardından garip bir silah çıkarıyor: Işıkta mavi mavi parlayan sapsız bir bıçak.{/n} "İşim bittiğinde, tüm hanedanlığı kurban edip kaderlerini tanrılara teslim edişimi o burnu havada hatun von Valancius'a izleteceğim... Sen de {name}, bu haklı eylemi gerçekleştirmeme vesile olacaksın."
